questions.question: What is prompt engineering?
options: The art of writing good intentional prompts that produce an output from a generative AI model
A more abstract version of programming
A super abstract programming of an AI model
A way to modify the mode or type of task that has been formed

questions.question: What is the best way to think about prompt engineering?
options: As a way to modify the mode or type of task that has been formed
As a more abstract version of programming
As a super abstract programming of an AI model
As the next step in programming languages
